tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telemedicine_ehr_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    telemedicine_date TIMESTAMP,
    telemedicine_notes TEXT,
    ehr_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE electronic_health_records (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	ehr_id INT,
	ehr_date DATE,
	ehr_notes TEXT,
	ehr_diagnosis VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE telemedicine_data (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  consultation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ehr_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  dob DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15),
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_history (
  visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  visit_date DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  prescription TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE doctor_profiles (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  speciality VARCHAR(50),
  experience_years INT,
  contact_email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
	patient_id INT,
	name VARCHAR(255),
	dob DATE,
	gender CHAR(1),
	contact VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE appointment_history (
	appointment_id INT,
	patient_id INT,
	date DATETIME,
	doctor VARCHAR(255),
	status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE medication_tracking (
	medication_id INT,
	patient_id INT,
	medication_name VARCHAR(255),
	dosage VARCHAR(50),
	frequency VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE lab_results (
	result_id INT,
	patient_id INT,
	est_name VARCHAR(255),
	result VARCHAR(255),
	date_reported DATE
);
